EmailTemplate.textOnly:
July 13, 2018
Here is your bi-weekly dose of 5 Point Friday, a Pivotal Pulse designed gather sales strategies, customer stories, talk tracks and valuable data points to uplevel customer conversations.
As a member of the Dell Tech Alliances team, my goal is to help you become a strategic asset to your customer by taking them to the next level of becoming a digital business. Ultimately, I’m here to help you land more sales. We are always open to iterating and improving so if you have ideas, requests, questions or suggestions do reach out.
1. Win of the Week - Telecom Italia buys PRA
The largest Telecom in Italy is the first Pivotal Ready Architecture customer on the books! Total deal size is $30M, offering an end-to-end solution including Isilon, VxRail, Pivotal, VMware and Consulting Services. PCF will support the launch of the Telcom's self-service customer portal to lower their cost of customer care, and improve user experience with up-to-date customer data. There has been a recent surge of requests for the PRA Reference Architecture, to find it search ‘Inside Dell’ on PRA. A total of 88 PRA Opportunity Registrations have been submitted. Be part of the top 100! Register your customer <[[http://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/4243153/d5679a47c95anewsletter]]> today.
2. Pivotal Saved You MONEY. Here’s How.
After working with Pivotal, the US Air Force, learned to code using agile methodology resulting in fuel cost savings of $1M every single day. Think about that. If you are a tax-paying American, you just saved $365M per year and put a stop to the $745M spent with a big defense contractor which produced nothing in 5 years, according to Fast Company <[[https://www.fastcompany.com/40588729/the-air-force-learned-to-code-and-saved-the-pentagon-millions]]>. It’s quite an impressive transformation. When you come across this t-shirt <[[https://kessel-run-af.myshopify.com/]]>... now you know what it means. #agileAF \o/
3. Analyst to Quote
Forrester conducted a Total Economic Impact analysis <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/the-total-economic-impact-of-pivotal-cloud-foundry]]> of customers to gauge the Return on Investment (ROI) of Pivotal Cloud Foundry. Using a stringent methodology among customers with many years experience, they calculated an ROI of an astounding 136%. There’s nothing more exciting than giving your customer some cache back (nerdy pun intended) at the end of the quarter.
4. What You May Have Missed
Niki Allen, Boeing’s Director of the Office of the CIO and Chief of Staff spoke at Pivotal’s Spring One Platform Conference last year. What she has accomplished at Boeing is nothing short of inspiring. Boeing has 150,000 employees, 20,000 suppliers across 65 countries and just one single flight of a 787 dreamliner generates 1TB of data. Clearly, the size and level of complexity is immense and the opportunity is enormous. Boeing wasn’t born digital. Listen to how Niki spearheaded the transformation in the below video.
<[[https://content.pivotal.io/content-executives/niki-allen]]>
5. Built Exclusively for Dell Tech Sales - Pivotal Pulse
As your Alliance team, we have been heads down dedicated to providing more seamless <[[http://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/4243153/d5679a47c95anewsletter]]> access to Pivotal sales reps, easier access to information, and greater opportunities for joint products and alignment in the field - so we can operate as one Dell Tech family. Another step in that direction has launched THIS WEEK, it’s a webpage exclusively dedicated to the needs of Dell Tech Sales, called Pivotal Pulse <[[https://partners.pivotal.io/English/General_DT_Info.aspx]]>. The next phase will include confidential resources including persona mapping, competitive battle cards, sales strategies and will require a login & PW. For now, take a look at the page <[[https://partners.pivotal.io/English/General_DT_Info.aspx]]> and let me know how I can improve it to better meet your needs.
Looking forward to a working with each of you. PRA + PKS FTW
Kindly, Courtney
